name: Easy Text-to-Speech
author: HandyPlugins

sections.description:
Easy Text-to-Speech transforms your website’s text into high-quality spoken audio, opening up a new dimension of accessibility and user engagement.
This WordPress plugin integrates cutting-edge text-to-speech technology from Amazon Polly, OpenAI, and ElevenLabs, making it effortless to provide an audio version of your content.

Key Features

  • Diverse Technology Options: Select from Amazon Polly, OpenAI, and ElevenLabs to access the best in speech synthesis.
  • Effortless Integration: Designed to work smoothly with both WordPress’s Classic and Block Editors, enabling audio conversion for blog posts, articles, and pages effortlessly.
  • Broad Accessibility: Expand your audience by making your content easily accessible to people with visual impairments or those who prefer auditory learning.
  • Intuitive User Interface: A clean, straightforward interface allows quick setup.

With Easy Text-to-Speech, enrich your site’s experience by providing a spoken version of your content, making your website more inclusive and engaging for all visitors.

PRO Features ðŸ”Š

Unlock the full potential of Easy Text-to-Speech Pro with these exclusive premium features:

  • OpenAI Integration: Leverage the latest in text-to-speech technology from OpenAI to produce crystal-clear audio outputs.
  • ElevenLabs Integration: Utilize ElevenLabs’ pioneering text-to-speech capabilities for exceptionally natural-sounding audio.
  • Dedicated Premium Support: Receive top-tier, responsive support to swiftly resolve any queries or issues.
  • Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy a clean, ad-free interface within the plugin’s admin page, enhancing usability and focus.

Discover more and upgrade to Easy Text-to-Speech Pro

Privacy Policy and Third-Party Service Disclosure

Easy Text-to-Speech utilizes third-party services such as Amazon Polly, OpenAI, and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech conversion. For details on how third-party services handle your data, please refer to their respective privacy policies.

  • AWS Data Privacy Center: https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/data-privacy
  • OpenAI Privacy Policy: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy
  • ElevenLabs Privacy Policy: https://elevenlabs.io/privacy

Contributing & Bug Report

Bug reports and pull requests are welcome on GitHub.

Documentation

Our documentation can be found at https://handyplugins.co/docs-category/easy-text-to-speech/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire /easy-text-to-speech directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Easy Text-to-Speech through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Does it work with the classic editor?

Yes, it works with both classic and block editors.

Can I use it with my custom post types?

Yes, you can use it with any post type.

Where to get Amazon Polly API key?

You can follow the instructions here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3 (September 23, 2024)

  • Use wp-block-editor instead of wp-edit-post for block editor.
  • Dependency updates.

1.0.2 (September 20, 2024)

  • Add multiple TinyMCE editor support.
  • Fixed – ACF compatibility issue.

1.0.1 (September 17, 2024)

  • Fixed – Don’t add TTS button for frontend TinyMCE editor.
  • Dependency updates.

1.0 (May 17, 2024)

  • First release

short_description: Easy Text-to-Speech is a powerful, user-friendly WordPress plugin designed to transform your textual content into high-quality synthesized speech.
